title: Coronavirus: Southampton team sanitises city centre

description: Could the number of coronavirus victims be worse than Iran makes out?

description: What Ian Forsyth saw at the Bergen-Belsen concentration camp in WW2 has haunted him for the past 75 years.

title: Burger King 'plant-based' Whopper ads banned
description: Ads suggested the burger, which is cooked alongside meat, is suitable for vegans, the watchdog says.

title: Coronavirus: ‘My business could go bust if insurers don’t pay’
description: Insurer Hiscox has refused to pay out on claims relating to coronavirus, some small businesses have said.

description: The island of Saaremaa is under strict quarantine with officials estimating that half the population have contracted Covid-19.

description: A year after fire devastated Notre Dame, construction has stopped and the cathedral is quiet.

title: PDC launching 'home tour' with players set to compete from own homes for 32 nights
description: PDC Home Tour launches featuring players in their own homes across 32 consecutive nights.

description: A Newcastle United takeover takes a step closer after new documents show that owner Mike Ashley has entered into a charge agreement with potential buyer Amanda Staveley.

title: Coronavirus: UK economy should shrink by record 35% by June
description: Once restrictions are lifted, growth is expected to recover quickly with no lasting damage.

title: Coronavirus: One in five deaths now linked to virus
description: Coronavirus prompts spike in mortality with data showing weekly deaths have hit record high.

description: The gym industry is calling on the government to prevent landlords from evicting businesses.
